Title: Remote Memory Exposure
Description: If a request is made using `multipart`, and the body type is a `number`, then the specified number of non-zero memory is passed in the body.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.2.6 before 2.47.0, all versions after 2.51.0 up to 2.67.0
Solution: Upgrade request to version 2.68.0 or higher.
